Sentencas: A series of co-doped ceria based nanocomposites consisting of Ce0.93Ca0.05Sr0.02O1.93 (CC5S2) and binary carbonates mixture Li2CO3-Na2CO3 (LNCO) have been prepared as functional solid electrolytes for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells (LT-SOFCs).
Titulo: Ca2+ and Sr2+ co-doped ceria/carbonates nanocomposites for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells: Composite effect

Sentencas: All the samples have been characterized with respect to their thermal behavior, phase, microstructure and electrical conductivity.
Titulo: Ca2+ and Sr2+ co-doped ceria/carbonates nanocomposites for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells: Composite effect

Sentencas: Single phase formation has been confirmed by X-ray diffraction.
Titulo: Ca2+ and Sr2+ co-doped ceria/carbonates nanocomposites for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells: Composite effect

Sentencas: In the composites, carbonates are present in the amorphous state.
Titulo: Ca2+ and Sr2+ co-doped ceria/carbonates nanocomposites for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells: Composite effect

Sentencas: Micrographs show the percolafive network of both the phases.
Titulo: Ca2+ and Sr2+ co-doped ceria/carbonates nanocomposites for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells: Composite effect

Sentencas: Impedance analysis has been used to study the conduction mechanism in the composites.
Titulo: Ca2+ and Sr2+ co-doped ceria/carbonates nanocomposites for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells: Composite effect

Sentencas: A sudden increase in the conductivity has been observed in all the composites.
Titulo: Ca2+ and Sr2+ co-doped ceria/carbonates nanocomposites for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells: Composite effect

Sentencas: This is attributed to a superionic transition at the interfaces.
Titulo: Ca2+ and Sr2+ co-doped ceria/carbonates nanocomposites for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells: Composite effect

Sentencas: Conductivity increases with increasing carbonate content.
Titulo: Ca2+ and Sr2+ co-doped ceria/carbonates nanocomposites for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells: Composite effect

Sentencas: Composition, CC5S2/35LNCO has the highest conductivity, 0.27 S cm(-1) at 500 degrees C with an activation energy of conduction 0.30 eV.
Titulo: Ca2+ and Sr2+ co-doped ceria/carbonates nanocomposites for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells: Composite effect

Sentencas: A small value of activation energy indicates the interfacial conduction of the ions in the composites.
Titulo: Ca2+ and Sr2+ co-doped ceria/carbonates nanocomposites for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells: Composite effect
Ca2+ and Sr2+ co-doped ceria/carbonates nanocomposites for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells: Composite effect
